attributes.action: Shut down public transportation in the UK to stop the spread of COVID-19.
attributes.background: The government can delay  or even prevent the spread of Coronavirus by stopping people travelling on public transport, especially at rush hour. On crowded trains and buses people are getting very close to each other and the spread is highly likely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300900

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
